about_the_game:
Get equipped with MEGA tunes, featuring all the classic 16-bit Mega Man 7 music composed by Yuko Takehara, Toshihiko Horiyama, and Makoto Tomozawa!

The soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
